20101208011015.333|20101208011017.000|CCO|HE PERSONALLY, THE HUSBAND,

20101208011018.667|20101208011020.333|CCO|DRUGS.

20101208011022.000|20101208011023.667|CCO|>> YES, AND INVESTIGATORS DIDN'T

20101208011027.000|20101208011028.667|CCO|CAUSE OF DEATH, BUT THAT WAS
